about_the_game:
The “Ancestors” manuscript was stolen, terrible ancient magic broke out. The curse struck the inhabitants of Zagrobiya, turning them into obedient puppets in the hands of a mysterious master. The once prosperous lands fell into darkness.
Together with Bony Bones, you have to save Zagrobiya, going from a simple resident to a brave hero, get to the cause of all disasters and destroy evil.


  • Here is a classic 3D platformer.
  • Explore 4 unique locations in Zagrobiya, each with its own atmosphere and biome.
  • Solve riddles, get through deadly traps and find secrets.
  • Help the people of Zagrobiya you meet during your adventure.
  • All the enemies and bosses you meet on your way are unique, find an approach to each one.
  • Level up and become stronger.
  • Chop enemies in close combat with an axe.
  • In ranged combat, destroy enemies with throwing bones, but remember that they are not endless.
  • Don't forget to take calcium if Bony Bones' bones are cracking from opponents' blows.

If you love fantasy, you like to explore new fairy-tale worlds and you are ready to help the inhabitants of Zagrobiya, then Bony Bones is waiting for you to go on an adventure.


The game was created by one person, without the help of neural networks, who believes that creating games is an art. Bony Bones Adventures is an attempt to create an action platformer with a cozy atmosphere, colorful characters and atmospheric locations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Bony Bones Adventures - is a 3D platformer where the lands of Zagrobiya have been enslaved by a necromancer. Help those in need, drive away the invaders, become a hero of Zagrobiya and return its freedom.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
